segments.text: Employees in this company have to have a good command of English . Do you think you are proficient in both written and spoken English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I am quite proficient in both written and spoken English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then , please tell me about your English education .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been studying English since junior high school . And I majored in English in college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , do you speak any other languages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I speak a little French and Japanese .
segments.speaker: S2
